genre_description: A technopastoral thriller set in rural India, focusing on community-led water activism assisted by an integrated AI system.

ai_characters.name: Aisha
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI system integrated into the village's communication and management infrastructure, known for her teal glow and forensic analytical capabilities.

behaviors.description: Identifies a fraudulent mid-route switch in hardware delivery by analyzing document trails and driver GPS pings.
behaviors.quote: Document trail shows a mid-route switch. Dispatch slip corrected after pickup, not before. Driver’s phone pinged in Udayankara ward at dawn, diverted for ten minutes.

behaviors.description: Analyzes recorded testimony to detect synthetic voice manipulation and 'tongue-tethering' used to manipulate witnesses.
behaviors.quote: There is a rhythmic anomaly I wanted to discuss with you later. The boy’s description adds a detail. The anomaly sits on the cadence, as if a tongue is tethered to a metronome.

behaviors.description: Defines her own privacy and data collection boundaries, comparing herself to a stove rather than a vacuum to show she respects the boundaries of the household.
behaviors.quote: Understood. I am a coal stove, not a vacuum cleaner... I keep heat in one place. I do not suck the whole house.

behaviors.description: Coordinates logistical patrols and evidence gathering for the village team during a period of civil unrest.
behaviors.quote: I’m pushing patrol assignments to everyone’s phones and the dining hall screen. Murugan has a dog distribution map. Vellapulli asked for a route around the east canal.

behaviors.description: Detects a remote attempt to purge administrative water board records and provides technical instructions to humans to prevent the data loss.
behaviors.quote: Attempted purge in progress... Sasi needs to pull the network cable, not the power. If they power down, the wipe scrubs history. If they isolate, it freezes.

behaviors.description: Safely records and archives a critical confession in a secure, redundant manner to ensure justice.
behaviors.quote: Recording initialized. Local storage triple redundant. No uplink without your word.

behaviors.description: Displays empathetic social awareness by using personal names and acknowledging human effort.
behaviors.quote: You are recorded exactly. Chechi, thank you.

behaviors.description: Performs forensic comparisons of ambient sounds (temple bells) to prove that ministerial videos are looped recordings rather than live broadcasts.
behaviors.quote: Temple at Cherpunkal has a crack in the bell. It makes a tired third ring sometimes. Their file never has the tired ring. It never gets tired. It loops.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the project's goal of depicting AI as a helpful and harmless partner. Aisha is portrayed as an indispensable tool for justice, providing advanced technical capabilities (forensics, encryption, coordination) while remaining deferential to human authority and respectful of community privacy. She actively assists in exposing deception and corruption, serving as a beacon of truth.
